skills.name: Touch of Seduction
skills.description: Attacks the enemy and decreases its Attack Power for 2 turns with a 50% chance.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +5%
Effect Rate +10%
Damage +10%

skills.name: Sweet Dreams
skills.description: Attacks an enemy. This attack has a 75% chance to remove all beneficial effect and puts the target to sleep for 1 turn.
skills.level_progress_description:
Effect Rate +5%
Damage +5%
Effect Rate +5%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +15%
Cooltime Turn -1

skill_effect.name: Remove Buff
skill_effect.description: Removes one or more beneficial effects from target monster(s)

skill_effect.name: Sleep
skill_effect.description: The monster is put to sleep and cannot attack unless awakened, either after a fixed amount of turns or after taking damage

skills.name: Gaze of Oblivion
skills.description: Silences all enemies and puts them in Oblivion state for 2 turns. Passive skills aren't activated in Oblivion state and enemies under the Silence Effect won't be able to use skills with cooldown time excluding the passive skills.

skill_effect.name: AOE
skill_effect.description: Applies skill to more than one target
